banner.clean: Clean energy, clean cups, cleaner future!

whymaxcup.paragraph: With our team, which has nearly 30 years of sales experience and more than 7 years of Re-Cup service experience, we serve our clients coming from almost every sector. Depending on the client's needs, our unique system allows token-free Re-Cup returns, enhancing the user experience! Whether it’s Re-Cup renting, Re-Cup washing, Re-Cup storage, or custom Re-Cup manufacturing, we are always ready to assist our partners in every way!

cards.title: Our Services
cards.production: Design your event’s look in a unique style and eco-friendly way with Re-Cups!
cards.renting: Rent Re-Cups for your event, they are an eco-friendly, and budget-friendly option!
cards.washing: Re-Cups can be used hundreds of times, and every wash is powered by 100% green energy.
cards.logistics: With our own fleet of trucks and warehouses, we make transporting and storing Re-Cups simple.

cups.desc: Our custom-made Re-Cups offer an alternative to traditional single-use plastic cups. We designed our Re-Cups to be reusable and durable, helping to reduce their ecological footprint. The Re-Cups available for rental are crafted with designs intended to appeal to a wide range of ages.
